message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $105 is still a little high for me. I'm happy to pay $90 for it. Let's try to make this happen.
Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go down to $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, though. I can sell it to you for $100.
